item.title: Territory Manager
item.description: Company Name - Nath Bio genes (I) Ltd (Veg.Division) Position - Territory Manager Location - Coimbatore territory Udumalai HQ covering Coimbatore,Erode,Salem & Dindigul. Qualifications - B.Sc Agriculture/ Any degree. Experience - 3-5 yrs in seeds division ( preferably for Veg.Crops) If interested candidates pls. send your CV to ramani.r@nathseeds.com

item.title: Welcome Jobs
item.description: Hello, Welcome to Cropz Jobs. We try to get the jobs from Agri business industry posted here.
